Freeze overall timer in Time Attack to 1 minute
042b9e88 00000e13
042b9e8c 00000e13

Freeze match timer in time attack to 60 secs
270f1070 00000e10
050f1070 00000e10
e0000000 80008000

Press Y+A on port 1 to use P2 costume on P1
282aae8e 00000900
022b9e36 00000001
e0000000 80008000

Press Y+A on port 2 to use P2 costume on P2
282aaf02 00000900
022b9e9e 00000001
e0000000 80008000

Force 2P costume to P2
002b9e9f 00000001

Force 2P costume to P1
002b9e37 00000001

Press Z to force Umagon&Sunbeam id 0x9 (Req. files)
282aae8e 00000010
48000000 802aad0c
de000000 80008180
58010000 00000028
de000000 80008180
120003ee 00000009
e0000000 80008000

Press Z+Y to force Maestro id 0x10 (Req. files)
282aae8e 00000810
48000000 802aad0c
de000000 80008180
58010000 00000028
de000000 80008180
120003ee 00000010
e0000000 80008000


To force load a different character change line 6
0x00 = endless loop loading screen
0x01 = Zatch
0x02 = Tia
0x03 = Brago
0x04 = Zeno
0x05 = Kanchome
0x06 = Bari
0x07 = Kido
0x08 = Wonrei
0x09 = Umagon/Sunbeam-san
0x0A = Victoream
0x0B = Laila
0x0C = Zofis
0x0D = Laila (Albert awake)
0x0E = Zofis (Milordo-Z)
0x0F = Ponygon
0x10 = endless loop (possibly Maestro, but missing .seg)
